pages.title: Glass
pages.text: Glass blocks are decorative blocks that can be used, instead of a $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-casing)Housing$(/l) block, to show the interior of the Turbine.
$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
